requiredOn.expr: ( identity.isNew && identity.isChild ) || ( identity.isUpdate && identity.isChild ) || ( !(identity.get('introducerRID') == nil || identity.get('introducerRID') == empty) || !(identity.get('introducerUIN') == nil || identity.get('introducerUIN') == empty))
( !(identity.get('introducerName') == nil || identity.get('introducerName') == empty) && (identity.get('introducerUIN') == nil || identity.get('introducerUIN') == empty))
( !(identity.get('introducerName') == nil || identity.get('introducerName') == empty) && (identity.get('introducerRID') == nil || identity.get('introducerRID') == empty))
identity.isNew || ( identity.isUpdate && (identity.updatableFields contains 'addressLine1' || identity.updatableFields contains 'addressLine2' || identity.updatableFields contains 'addressLine3'))

schema.description: Used to hold biometrics only for authentication

requiredOn.expr: (identity.isChild && identity.isNew) || (identity.isUpdate && identity.updatableFieldGroups contains 'IntroducerDetails') || !(identity.get('introducerName') == nil || identity.get('introducerName') == empty)
